alert.note: Alert for West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 01 at 11:28AM PST until December 02 at 12:00AM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT PST TONIGHT FOR THE NORTHERN SIERRA SLOPES... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Western Plumas County/Lassen Park and West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada Counties. * WHEN...Until midnight PST tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel impacts may linger overnight into early Friday morning. Additional heavy snow is possible Saturday afternoon into early Monday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park
